name: Bi0hazard
description:
Play as a virus trying to take over the human body in this reverse tower defense game!

Gameplay:

  • Use WSAD for camera movement. 
  • Use the Mouse to Drag Select towers and Direct the flow of attack.
  • Scroll to pan in and out.
  • Have fun!
